website_summaries.verdict: These curtains are worth their price for their excellent light-blocking and insulating abilities. Definitely the best on the market.
pros: Superior light blockage capabilities compared to competitors
cons: On the more expensive side of the price range

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down - lots of light bleed through
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered many sets of thermal curtains from Best Home Fashion and was always pleased with their products until now. I ordered a set in Navy and they feel very thin. The picture is showing light showing through that's indirect because the window is under a tree and the sun is weak because it's Autumn. I'm shocked the quality has gone down so dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: LauraH

customer_reviews.title: Land of the midnight sun
customer_reviews.text: We live in Alaska and our summers are bright. I was looking for the perfect curtains for my kids room to block out the daylight when bedtime comes. 8:00pm can look like 4:00pm which is hard for kids to understand and settle down. These have worked great! We purchased a curtain rod that wraps around to the wall so there wasn't a space between the wall and curtain where it hung. These really blackout the room and have worked great! I was hesitant since they are not lined, but no worries here. Great length and beautiful dark rich navy color.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Room darkening but not blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 beige panels for a wide east-facing bedroom window that gets a lot of morning sun. 2 panels would have just fit, but I used double the length hoping to improve the darkening, and I can very easily see the light from the window through the material. I have grey curtains on a different window and they let no light through. The material itself isn't the most attractive. It looks like semi-gloss polyester. I have a double curtain rod, so I'll probably put these closest to the window for some light blocking, and some more attractive curtains on the other rod to hide these. Too bad that's 2x the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd_E

customer_reviews.title: Beige still let in too much light for me
customer_reviews.text: Same as the other reviews. I'm not sure if it blocks 80% of the light but I took a chance and it still let's in too much light for my liking or, in my opinion, to be accurately labeled as blackout. This curtain is solid so it's fine for privacy like a regular non-sheer curtain, and an extra star was added for the description explaining that there might be a discrepancy. Unfortunately, it still let in too much light for me. I will probably return as soon as I find a proper replacement. Does anyone know if the gray ones block light more similar to the black/navy ones or if they block less light like beige/light blue ones?
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: keep the light out
customer_reviews.text: Witht his last purchase we have now bought a set of these for each of our bedrooms. They are great at blocking out the light and keeping the kids alseep. Im am not sure what level of "energy efficiency" these have but I'm sure it is better than nothing at keeping the heat in the house on the cold days as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, keeps the windows draft from coming in or out, also keeps it very dark when they're closed. The color is perfect as well!
customer_reviews.author: DemonBladeFPV

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole life!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy. This. Now!! My room is the front room of the house with a huge window and of course the hottest room in the house. I found these online, mostly was interested because of the heat blocking. Let me tell you, instantly dropped my room at least 10 degrees! Not to mention, they worked awesome for light blocking too. Extra bonus. Soft,good quality. Great product. I didn’t get the ties but I was so happy with the results I honestly didn’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Yomaira Perez

customer_reviews.title: Almost completely blackout
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 sets of dark blue for the living room and one beige for the bedroom. The material and workmanship is quality. The blue are almost completely blackout. While the beige are not quite as good, they're good enough that I bought another 2 sets for sliding doors. Also, there are two options for running the curtain rod. I used a inexpensive curved rod, ran it through the pocket rather than the loops, mounted it outside and above the window frame, and voila, no light leaks through. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No noise or sound blocking, barely blackout, high fee for returns
customer_reviews.text: I bought the beige curtains to help shut out some of the street sound in downtown. The curtains block out nothing from outside, we can hear everything just as before, the loud trucks and everything (other reviews raved about this). To add to that, the curtains block out little light and the seller charges a $10 fee for returns? That's literally 30% of the cost of the curtain for just putting it up once and sending it back. The high return fee is why I'm downgrading this review from 3 to 1 stars, absolutely crazy for an Amazon seller
customer_reviews.author: Christine Zhao

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order of this curtain not happy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pink ones we got but this black ones didn’t meet our expectations and light goes thru the curtains. Surprised that the pink ones are more solid then these black ones.
customer_reviews.author: david b. hernandez

customer_reviews.title: wonderful bargain. I use a dual rod system with ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful bargain. I use a dual rod system with the thermal insulated blackout curtains close to the window and a second curtain to the room with a design that plays off the solid thermal curtains. eliminates a significant amount of draft coming off the windows. also, easy to have a seamstress custom lengths, etc...
customer_reviews.author: BRF Inc

customer_reviews.title: not blackout!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THESE CURTAINS AT FIRST SITE, THE MATERIAL IS SO LUXURIOUS! THEN I HUNG THEM AND REALIZED THEY WERE ONLY ROOM DARKENING, NOT BLACKOUT CURTAINS. I GET MIGRAINES AND TRULY NEED A BLACKOUT ROOM TO BE ABLE TO RETREAT TO ON OCCASION ...PLEASE HELP !! I GOT THEM, HUNG THEM AND NEXT DAY RETURNED IMEDIATELY TO THE PACKAGING. HOWEVER, BECAME ILL AND WAS UNABLE TO RETURN AND 6 WEEKS PASSED TOO QUICKLY. NOW MY RETURN WINDOW HAS CLOSED...WHAT CAN I DO???
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these curtains. We have a toddler who still naps and single-paned windows in our apartment, so any noise from outside sounds like it's on the inside of our place. These curtains helped dampen the sound a good amount and kept the room nice and dark for my daughter's naps. They work so great, I even bought another set and hung them on a double rods, to dampen the sound even more. It was well worth the money! Furthermore, they're packaged well, color was what I expected, and they were ready to use out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: domend

customer_reviews.title: Solid room-darkening
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a temporary fix while waiting for window treatments to be installed. Not expecting the greatest curtains, I was delighted to find that these hung very nicely, wrinkle free, neutral color as pictured, very substantial. There is a fabric pocket along the back side at the top, meant for the rod to slide through. I needed them to be a bit longer, so I didn't use the pocket, but attached rings with hooks and put the rod through the rings to provide a couple inches of length. The fabric is soft and smooth with a very, very slight sheen. They provide excellent privacy and room darkening. For the money and good functionality, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AnnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Muave curtains and they are true to color. They also block the sun well. I love them. They brought a pop of color to my bedroom and it was just what I needed. Also, the are such a good price to come with 2 Panels! Most curtains only come with 1 so it gets expensive ordering 2! Definitely would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lize Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout curtain that is energy efficient
customer_reviews.text: Quality made blackout curtains. Heavy material that feels good & helps maintain room temperature in the Summer & Winter with the design. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love thi curtain
customer_reviews.text: I took this picturee 10 in the morning. I love thi curtain. I only bought one first to see if its nice and I think its doing its job. I'm gonna buy another pair for the other window. Beige is always the best color! I suggest buy a curtain hook on the side since the curtain tie comes with it doesnt have cufflinks. But overall I love it. Hope my picture helps.
customer_reviews.author: FRANKIE PALOMA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great black out curtain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great black out curtain. I have bought this item 3 times. 1 red, 1 gray and 1 creme for my girlfriend. All of the curtains did great job on blocking the sun light and the warmth from it. The creme did the least though, it was the lightest in color. Which is fine though, there is no way to block 100% of the light.
customer_reviews.author: Customer5390

customer_reviews.title: Soft, pretty, and block out lots of light.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains replaced full height curtains. I enjoyed the shorter length for the feeling of security not having the curtains hanging over outlets on the walls. These really do a great job of blocking out the light while still looking and feeling soft. It does not block out all of the light (you can still see some pin pricks coming through at the peak of the day), and of course you'll still get some bleed through at the edges, but Wow, what a difference it makes in the room. We will likely be buying more matching curtains for all our rooms now. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love that these have back tabs to make installing easier
customer_reviews.text: Love that these have back tabs to make installing easier, and they look nicer hanging. Hung these in the grandkids' bedroom. These curtains do a fabulous job keeping light out, and the grandchildren now sleep until a decent hour instead of waking us up at 6:30 every morning! In fact, my husband and I now get a cup of coffee down before we get invaded!
customer_reviews.author: TammyH

customer_reviews.title: NOT Blackout or thermal
customer_reviews.text: While these curtains look ok, how they can claim to be blackout or insulated is beyond me. When the sun is shining, you can see thousands of pinpricks of light on the curtains, and that's with a sheer undercurtain in place. They are made from a fabric which feels great, looks ok, but there is no backing of any kind that would make them any more thermal than hanging a medium weight twill fabric at the window. While they are good to block the light from passing cars or the streetlight at night, as soon as the sun comes up they fill the room with a bright, warm, golden glow. Nice, but NOT blackout by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Starheart

customer_reviews.title: Great light blocking drapes
customer_reviews.text: We bought both lengths. This review covers both. This material is incredibly soft yet blocks all light! Very pleased so far. Holy smokes! These are incredibly great at blocking light. The previous set up we had was in a basement and our new living room is upstairs with tons of light. The 2 new sets of curtains we purchased have basically made this living room a home theatre. I didn't expect this good of coverage for the price or my living room full of windows. The curtains are beautiful and appear well made.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: works great for Alaskan summers with 22 hrs of daylight!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the baby blue pair, the pink pair and the wheat pair when we moved to Alaska last summer. We get 22 hrs of full on sun in the summer and no one was getting sleep. They work like a charm. The material is thick enough to block the light very well. It is soft and of a very nice quality. Plus they work great to keep the warmth in during the winters and keep it cool in the summer. I've seen other light blocking curtians and these are by far the best. We love ours so much that im buying 5 more pair to go in our new Alaskan home. Trust me, these curtains are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: C. Barron

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Looks Good Too!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 month old would rarely sleep more then 15-30 minutes in his crib during the day due to the room being too bright and our blinds barely keeping the light out. I ordered these after much research and they do work! The navy blue ones match our nursery decor perfectly and have the look of "normal" curtains. They block out almost all of the sunlight and keep the room cooler during the day which is a big plus since his room gets sunlight half of the day. Our son now sleeps up to 2 hours at a time in his crib making naptimes more efficient and mommy very happy. I am so glad we purchased these curtains!
customer_reviews.author: R. Austin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING and the price is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that when I first order these curtains I figured that I would just be getting the usual one curtain. For the price listed I wasn't too sure of how the material would be either. I couldn't spend too much, so I just took the chance. When I opened the package I was very surprised that there where two curtains per pack and the material was wonderful!! They have made a HUGE difference in my guest bedroom. It is much darker and a lot cooler in there! After I bought the first pack I had to buy the rest of my curtains from them! I would highly recommend these to anyone and everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice curtains.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these curtains yesterday and hung them today. They are really nice. They are packaged well to avoid wrinkles. They are a good weight, hang nicely and look great. I only buy washable curtains but since I haven't washed them yet, I didn't give 5 stars, but that's not meant as a negative. I didn't need to wash them; the wrinkles will most likely fall out after they hang for awhile and I'll steam them a little if needed to help eliminate the wrinkles. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joewaterford

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what happened but I like that. The Navy will block out a TON ...
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY the fastest shipped product I have ever received. Ordered it 11pm at night, received it by 10am the next day. I don't know what happened but I like that. The Navy will block out a TON of light, hands down. The reviews were correct, which allowed me to get a good nights sleep do to construction happening near us using a 40 ka-ja-billion candle spot light. Blocked about 99% out - 1% was due to the fabric not being flush with the window which is user error but didn't effect anything I just mentioned - so buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vamu

customer_reviews.title: These curtains are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtains for my son's apartment, he said they "block out the night light" outside his apartment bedroom window. He also likes how they keep his bedroom dark during the day time when he's using his desktop PC. One thing I noticed when you close the curtains at the top, the curtain panel on the right catches a little bit where the two curtain rods meet. But too be fair about all curtain rods, the curtain panel usually catches in that area, where the two curtain rods meet inside each other.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & light blocking.
customer_reviews.text: We have these in our living room, dining room, and play area. They look classy and stylish, and they really black out the light. If we have our lights on inside and our curtains drawn, our house looks pitch black from outside. These would be great in a nursery if you were trying to make it dark for nap time. I would recommend throwing them in the dryer with a damp rag when you receive them to get out the creases.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well for us. Our son's room is a southern facing room that gets warm and very bright. These do a great job of blocking the sun. (though not totally dark when the sun is on them, they make it dark enough for our son to nap). For all artificial light (we live in Chicago and in the winter, the streets light bouncing off snow or a really full moon can make a room very bright), these work perfectly! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wizzbert

customer_reviews.title: Beige is NOT beige...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in both the navy for my sons room and beige for mine. LOVE the navy ones and they really do block out light and make the room warmer. However...the "beige" ones for my room are nowhere near the color pictured. They are closer to the "gold" color shown. Its a dark tan not an off-white beige. They work so I have kept them but had I known I would not have ordered them. They do not block as much light as the navy but they definitely block enough. Disappointing about the color though...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the third set of blackout curtains I have tried. They are really good at blocking the light, and they also look good too, like more expensive drapes. I like that they have tiebacks, and they insulate the room nicely, keeping the room warm in winter and cooler in summer. I got these after a heatwave when my room was unbearably hot, used them for the next heatwave, and noticed they really did help keep the room cooler. You will sleep better in a darker room, and if you want to take a nap during the day, well, this will really work.
customer_reviews.author: IzzieCA

customer_reviews.title: Curtains are ok
customer_reviews.text: Quality size and size wise it is ok, It can be better if they have little bit extra cloth folded on the top or bottom ends so if some one need 1-3 inches extra as per his window size they can unstitched it and use that extra inches to fit in their window. This is my case all curtains are 2-3 inches shorter for my windows.
customer_reviews.author: petcharat schotte

customer_reviews.title: Backing is not white
customer_reviews.text: These curtains look nice but they don't entirely block out all the light. I bought the dark navy blue. The darker color probably helps block more light, but it also attracts more heat and doesn't do a great job of keeping my room cool. I had a pair from walmart that had white backing and they didn't get nearly as hot. Those were lower quality and quickly deteriorated and stopped blocking light. I'm not sure if a lighter color would keep out as much light as the darker colors, but maybe I should've tried that.
customer_reviews.author: Unpeachy

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: The curtains we had hanging in the room were not enough for my little one. The neighbors nightly bonfires allowed light and sound to flood his room. The new new curtains give him a comfortable, quiet, and dark sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Navy color works great for blackout
customer_reviews.text: I bought the navy curtains, and they work great for blocking sunlight! Especially when paired with special room-darkening rods that allow the curtains to wrap around the sides and cut off sun there, as well as installed a bit higher above the top of the window, to cut down on sunlight from there as well. As others have mentioned, the "navy" is very, very dark. Almost a black at first glance. So be prepared for that. But if you want real blackout, the darker color curtains definitely are more effective!
customer_reviews.author: Tak

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect for the Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Our little one had trouble with naps. We don't like sleeping in a room full of light so why would she? I bought these curtains because they looked nice and were blackout. They are better than expected! They also keep out the heat of the day and living in Southern California that can be all year round. They look like regular designer curtains but keep the light out fantastically. I loved them so much I bought another set for our bedroom. Now I too can nap in darkness while she is napping. They are great! I will buy another set when we have our next child for sure!
customer_reviews.author: M Major

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to put in baby's room so that he would hopefully fall asleep easier now that it is staying light outside later.I put one panel over each of the windows under my regular curtains. I can say that no light comes through the curtain. The room is not completely dark because light does come in around the sides and top. But that is just the way I have them hanging - not the fault of the curtain. I am pleased to report that these curtains do actually seem to help baby fall asleep more quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Palencer

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the material. They darken the room wonderfully. My son works night shift and they really help him to get the rest he needs. The packaging was really great. The shipping time was right away. When I opened the package, I was quite impressed with the quality and versatility of the hanging variations. Here's what I have to say honestly, I am buying some more for the other windows in my hot southern home. Oh, we in the south have cold days also. They do help block the cold.
customer_reviews.author: yogiandbooboo

customer_reviews.title: Love these curtains
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my baby's room. He has an east facing window in his room and he was waking with the sun. I already had a blackout shade in the window, but light still was quite bright in the morning in this room. After setting up the curtains the room is very dark, no more baby rising with the sun! I intend to get another set for the master bedroom. I did order the navy blue after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzjen

customer_reviews.title: Block out the sun completely!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great and block out the sun completely. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: These curtains have been wonderful in my six-year-old's room
customer_reviews.text: These curtains have been wonderful in my six-year-old's room. He sleeps in the sunniest room in the house, which can sometimes be a problem if he's getting up at sunrise. We got these curtains in navy blue, and they successfully block out the bright light that used to wake him up very early. They are attractive and are made of a thick and good quality material. The pull-back ties are also very easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Basic Panels
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to keep out both light and heat (in the summer months) and light and cold (in the winter months). I had read other reviews that the beige color wasn't as room-darkening as the darker fabrics (of course), but I have found these to be perfect. I purchased two panels to be sure to have lots of fabric, and after six months these have made a great difference in keeping the guest room comfortable. The drapes hang well, had no noticeable wrinkles on removal from packaging, and look great. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kycalypso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good at blocking out the light without having to use dark color curtains! They work well - quality is better than I expected and I would buy these again! UPDATE: I did indeed buy another set of these! They work very well, and I like that they are plain as they do not detract from the room decor itself. These just blend in nicely. Great product - highly recommend if you are looking for simple curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really nice material
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for three windows in a bedroom. I threw them in the dryer for 5 minutes with a damp towel and the creases where they were folded came right out. The material is very slightly stretchy and very soft. Nice heavy weight and makes the room quite dark. Rather than a rod pocket for hanging, these curtains have fabric tabs on the backside so you can easily slide a large decorative rod through the back side to hang. This makes them look like draperies rather than gathered curtains. The material is very rich looking and they hang very nicely. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rembach

customer_reviews.title: Color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes the beige curtain look fairly light, but the curtains I received were much darker, with a yellowish-gray tint, more of a "putty" color. I didn't even check to see if they were blackout because the color was so off (I should have). They were soft, but looked pretty cheap, plain, & ugly. Might work OK as a blackout liner (if they truly are blackout). I returned these but might try a different color, or use a darker color as a blackout liner.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was looking for an inexpensive curtain but I didn't want cheap looking. These curtains are better looking in person! And they are made of a thick material that blocks the light very well. I have a young child who naps during the day so these are perfect. I bought the cream color as I wanted a fresh clean look. Also when you first receive them you need to put them in the dryer with a damp cloth to get out the creases.
customer_reviews.author: jeanypaul

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in beige, and yes, they are NOT 100% black out. I'd say maybe 80%. But it's fine for me because I have to get up in the morning anyway. I just wanted to block out super early morning light because my windows face south. But if you're looking to sleep during the day because of a night shift, I wouldn't get the beige. The fabric is not plastic-y and is a soft weave throughout. This is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty dark. I wouldn't say it's as heavy as ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the bubblegum pink color for our daughter's room. Warning - it's really, really pink! It does its job, though, and keeps out the sun very well. Her room gets full sun during nap time, but with the curtains drawn, it's pretty dark. I wouldn't say it's as heavy as the curtains in most hotels, but it's dark enough so that my toddler can rest during the day. Note that these are the short curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Kona K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Love these! This curtains - what can I say? They are as described! Keep the light out but not completely, my sons love them because other curtains are way to thin or thick. Also these are wide!, so in my case instead of buying 4 panels to cover a bedroom window, I only needed to buy 2! ALSO THE BEST PART - I did not need to iron them when I took them out of the packaging! It is a regular plastic zippered bag, but must be the material! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: yliana

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo pleased with the quality of these curtains and the ease ...
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo pleased with the quality of these curtains and the ease at which I can open and shut them. The texture is pleasant and attractive, and they drape so well, and definitely keep out the light. Our guests overslept because they couldn't tell it was daylight - particularly nice for the ones suffering jet lag. would like to buy more of these for my other windows!
customer_reviews.author: oceanlover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: As some people have already mentioned, the lighter colors do not block out light. They do however make it much less harsh, which was all I really needed. They seem to be well constructed. The curtains were much bigger than I expected though. I have one single window in my bedroom and a larger double window, and bought three sets thinking I would need them all. I only ended up needing 3 of the six curtains because they're pretty wide.
customer_reviews.author: AllyFox

customer_reviews.title: Great Curtains!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son (4 years old). We live on a busy street and the lights from the cars were scaring him at night. These curtains are high quality and really block out the light. No light came through at night. He fell right to sleep and didn't complain once about shadows and lights. In the morning there was a very slight amount of light coming through at the top and bottom but the room was still very dark. I highly recommend these curtains. As a note I bought the navy blue curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Milk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer in person. These curtains are very soft to the touch and they do blackout light. The back tabs make the hang very professional and the look is perfection. I would definitely recommend them to anyone for any room. I purchased the 63 inch length for a bedroom and plan to buy another set for a second bedroom. I also purchased the 84 inch for the master bedroom. Very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wabich

customer_reviews.title: Do you like to sleep in? Me too - buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a shore house that I rent. One of the WORST things is early sunrise during summer, and I would be wide awake at 7am on Saturdays or Sundays. Hey, I like to sleep in! These were fantastic. Easy to install and made my room SO dark. I suffered for years before pulling the trigger and buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. The quality I find is much better than any at this price and even some pricier. These are a great thickness which is why it actually works to keep the sun out. Will be buying some more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE CURTAINS!!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are beautiful!! I love them, they are what they say, blackout curtains!! Of course the darker the color the darker the room stays, if you go with a lighter color some light does come through! The colors are vibrant, I like the top ruffle, looks so nice in the bedrooms, easy to put up & clean. I would recommend these to anyone wanting blackout curtains & the price is the best part!! Great Deal, I definatley recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: They block a lot of light
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are one of my best ever purchases on Amazon. I selected the navy blue ones after reading reviews that said lighter colored ones do not block as much light and they are awesome. They really block out a lot of light. They are thick and well made. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocking light and saves a little on heat too.
customer_reviews.text: Love these - I like a real dark room, and with the sun rising early in the morning on the east coast, and me often not getting up until 8 or 9am with my work, these really help me sleep longer. Also notice when closing them on cold night the temperature in the room goes up a couple degrees just due to them being nice and heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: High quality but NOT blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these curtains in beige. They are a heavy material, good quality, and they hang well. But, they are definitely NOT "blackout" curtains. They block direct sunlight into the room, but they do not darken it very much. It may be the color - darker colors would likely darken the room a lot more. Don't buy beige ones if you need to a room to be dark when the sun is out.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: They are soft and flow nicely. However they aren't all that attractive
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely blackout curtains. No light comes through our western facing windows. With other blackout curtains that I have purchased there was always a certain amount of light that shown through - but not these! They are soft and flow nicely. However they aren't all that attractive. Wouldn't want them in my living room. Plan to get more for downstairs to beat the sun and heat.
customer_reviews.author: Phil T

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda just bought from Amazon in the first place!
customer_reviews.text: We bought new curtains for our daughters room from Land of Nod and bought way expensive black-out liners to go with them. We should have just bought these from Amazon for less than $40 and been done with it. They are soft and flexible, easy to move across the curtain rod and do just what they are designed to do. Need black-outs? Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Looks good was made very well , recomend
customer_reviews.text: Decent color , material is nice and thick , very soft to the touch and does do a great job as a blackout . Wife loves it but would have much perfered it in a grey suede color / microfiber Other than that the measurements are perfect and everything came together nicely waiting for the white modern tree curtain to finish the double curtain rod
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love these...
customer_reviews.text: for black out the best I could find... works for us... well made... not too shiny... looks like real drapes : ) cream color on inside... thick... blocks 95% of light... of course a little comes in around edge but not much.. I take the ends around the end of rod to make it even better... we are very happy with them... Navy is on the dark side which I wanted : )
customer_reviews.author: sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Do block light
customer_reviews.text: This color of this curtain does block 95% of the light. I am very sensitive to light when I am sleeping and this product helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Miely Xia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've tried a couple other supposed "room darkening" curtains, but none of them come near these. I got the navy blue, so they're very dark to begin with. I don't know if the lighter colors would function as well. In bright sunlight, you can see tiny pinpoints of light, but they're negligible. I have blinds also, so when the blinds are closed and these curtains are drawn, no light gets through. If you're trying to darken a room, I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Just okay....definitely not black-out curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are ok. We bought the beige color for our bedroom -- they are not black out curtain. They block a good amount of light, but the sun still comes through. It would nice if they blocked out more of the light -- but as they are, I'd say they work closer to 65% -- definitely not 99%. Good enough. We are keeping them -- but if you want truly room darkening curtain....be careful about this option.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Completely Darkens Room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these blackout curtains for my 2 year old son's room and the work wonders. I ordered the navy blue, and they block out every bit of light from his window. They helped during his transition from his crib to his big boy bed. The darkness in the room makes it easier for him to nap/sleep in. It's a life saver for all parents.
customer_reviews.author: B. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: After hanging these wonderful curtains, it is now very tolerable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the navy curtains for my sun porch. I can tell you that prior to getting these curtains, no one could bear to sit there d/t the extreme heat. After hanging these wonderful curtains, it is now very tolerable, heat was drastically reduced because these curtains keep the sun out,. They keep the light out very nicely as well. Superb quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charl L Rimboeck

customer_reviews.title: FUNCTIONAL AND NICE LOOKING !
customer_reviews.text: These work VERY well for their intended purpose...And!..they look nice too!! I ordered the navy and they are dark enough to keep out the bright afternoon sun (lowering the temperature in bedroom) -- these curtains look VERY nice and do what they say they do!!..a very good purchase! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyGal

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bed Bath and Beyond.
customer_reviews.text: The sun shines right into the room we hung these curtains in and they have definitely helped darken the room. Quality wise they're pretty good and you can only see a few pin-sized spots of light through them. The curtains cost less than half of what we paid for "black-out curtains" from Bed Bath and Beyond and they keep the room way darker. One thing to keep in mind is that light will still show around the curtains along the wall during the day but the room will be darker than before.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fuhriman

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ever purchased black out blinds or curtains and I did so based on the reviews here on Amazon. I have had sleep issues for a long time and a friend recommended blinds so I purchased the beige ones. As others have noted, they are quality, soft and actually block out all the light, even though they are a light color. I am very happy with them and have noticed my sleep has improved.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be poorly made....the stitching is crooked. However, they do block out the light and at night offer privacy. Fabric is not cotton , it is very soft and kinda shiny -nothing I have ever bought before .Originally, I was very displeased with this item but now I have hung them , for a plain curtain I do like them. I do think they are a little too expensive nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle48

customer_reviews.title: Navy, Chocolate and Burgundy are Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We have these black out drapes hanging in the master bedroom, our guest room and in my son's room. As we update our basement, we are looking to buy a few more panels for the areas. We can attest to the darker colors working magnificently! They block the light, reduce the cold and hang beautifully. We hope that the gray shade works as effectively.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: making it hard towatch TV due to the glare
customer_reviews.text: These do well at blocking light, which I desperately needed. The windows at the front and back of my house face east and west, so there is a lot of light coming in in the mornings and evenings, making it hard to watch TV due to the glare. These curtains look great, and best of all they block the light completely.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: THEY INSULATE PRETTY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I HAD AN ISSUE WITH PAY-PAL. AS A RESULT THE CURTAINS WERE SENT TO AN OLD ADDRESS. EVENTUALLY, THEY FOUND THEIR WAY TO ME. I WAS IMPRESSED WITH THE FACT THERE WERE TWO DIFFERENT WAYS YOU COULD ATTACH THE CURTAIN TO THE ROD. THE INDIVIDUAL SEWN ON LOOPS WORKED BEST FOR ME. THEY COME WITH NICE STAYS AS WELL. NOW, IF I CAN JUST GET THE CAT TO LEAVE EM ALONE.
customer_reviews.author: CLIFF C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains! They are the most perfect blackout curtains I've come across. I bought the navy ones, so I can't speak to the lighter colors. But the navy are so awesome! I have tried a lot of blackout curtains and these are the best! Plus, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Work great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Each panel was so large, 1 set was enough to cover both bedroom windows with 1 curtain panel on each! I just pull them aside in the morning. I liked that I was able to hang them using several options. The fabric is heavy & soft. It does not completely block out all light (a little gets in around the edges & top) but they work quite well to darken the room. Overall delighted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Def not full black out!
customer_reviews.text: Def not full black out. During the day it still lets in a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Chess

customer_reviews.title: They're keepers. Would re-order.
customer_reviews.text: Feels nicely made, not thin or cheap, and they work. I put them in my big RV windows and they keep the heat out. You can hang them normally on a rod or there are tabs on the back you can hang them with, which would give it a more bunched up look, if that's what you like. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: 1FLHippy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These do a GREAT job of keeping out the sun. I live in Seattle and got these in Spring, so it's not super bright, but it makes our kid's room super dark (I got the navy color). I also appreciate that these are a softer material than other black out curtains and they come with a tie back piece for each side. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ycm

customer_reviews.title: nice but not total blackout
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are the nicest blackout curtains I have tried. The fabric is soft and very supple. Be aware that the beige color does not block out all the light. I am using them with aluminum mini blides and still a amall amount of light comes through. This works for me but a day sleeper may need to use a dark color to increase the darkness. All in all, I love these and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ed

customer_reviews.title: Decent Curtains but they Don't Provide Total Darkness.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have to iron these, so right away they won me over. I purchased the beige color for my son's nursery. They do not block all of the sun, but they do a much better job than standard curtains. They do not have a liner in the back- just extra thick fabric. If you need TOTAL darkness, spend the extra money and get curtains with a truly opaque liner in the back.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conelli

customer_reviews.title: Buy darker color and floor length
customer_reviews.text: It is not real blackout curtain. My bedroom was still 30% bright and make sure to buy floor length even you have smaller window. May be because of the color was not dark, it really didn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Hye S.

customer_reviews.title: Room darkening, not blackout
customer_reviews.text: Nice curtains, especially for the price but if you are looking for complete blackout...look elsewhere. These are good for privacy & help to darken room some but I'm using in living room not bedroom because they do not block enough light. A darker color might work differently, mine are a light beige.
customer_reviews.author: New2Me70

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have searched high and low for a blackout curtain for my son's room. It's to blockout any unwanted lights at night so he can have a peaceful sleep and this provided the needed blackout. Great product...love it and would recommend it to anyone especially since the price is not that expensive!
customer_reviews.author: DoyZ

customer_reviews.title: Navy blue blackout success!
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I ordered the navy blue for my infant's room. These curtains do an EXCELLENT job of blocking light. Highly recommend and the size was just perfect. Photos included to show how they work.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in navy. The color is quite nice - the drapes look more expensive than they are. They also keep my room dark and cool on bright, hot days. It's not a perfect blackout effect, but short of bricking up the windows I'm not sure I can do better than these.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Black Out
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are in our bathroom and bedroom. I love them. I have more privacy in the bathroom (had blinds before). The bedroom is my place to go when I have horrible headaches. It does a wonderful job blacking out the light. And a big plus is that they are washable. These curtains added style to our rooms.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Best curtains!
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. I have them in three different colors. I was a bit skeptical if the lighter color would work and it does work really well. It was a little more beige in color than I thought. But the color turned out great matching my room anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my living room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my living room. Blocks out almost all the light and the room stays much warmer now. Now I want to get them for my bed room.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product but some color inconsistencies
customer_reviews.text: These curtains drape very nicely, block light well and I think they will keep out some of the cold--it is too early to tell on that. I would have given it a 5 but in my beige curtain set, one curtain was beige and the other had a slight tan/beige color to it. I showed it to someone else and they also saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Moore

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME blackout capability.
customer_reviews.text: These are the first blackout curtains that actually work! It darkens the room so much that my light-sensitive toddler can take a nap with full sun shining on his window. We got the beige, we seems more like a light brown/tan. Thick curtain and nice quality material. Highly recommend them! Buying another two sets for my hubby (works nights) and baby!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa La Manna

customer_reviews.title: The construction is good quality but this is NOT a black-out curtain I ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction is good quality but this is NOT a black-out curtain I would call it a DIMMER curtain at best. Not worth the price... Buyers Remorse not to mention I never received the rods....
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Worker

customer_reviews.title: nice material, they block out noise from outside Cons- ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The curtains are very soft, nice material, they block out noise from outside Cons- I bought the beige color and it turned out to be an ugly greenish color that wasn't portrayed in the photos. I haven't seen the other colors in person but they may be great, i just wouldn't recomend the biege if you want a true biege.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a true Blackout curtain.
customer_reviews.text: Not a true blackout curtain, but fairly heavy and does take down the light quite a bit at a good price. These do not seem to have an actual "blackout" layer stitched into them, but they work well enough for the nursery in the summer sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: B&K Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The best, best black out curtain for the best price
customer_reviews.text: The best, best black out curtain for the best price. I bought the Navy color and believe me my bedroom is now a dark cave. LOL. Just the way I like it when I sleep in on the weekends. This would be great for those that work night shift and sleep during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The lined curtains are of heavy quality material with tie backs enclosed. This is the only pair of curtains that I could find in this size and this quality. The beige is not an ugly beige at all as one other review said. It is just a nice neutral beige that blends well without jumping out at you. A very good product indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Actual color slightly more grey and muted. Which is fine with me. The thickness is perfect and blocks out light. The sheen is not awful and barely noticeable. I also have the olive color which is darker too. I like this brand of curtains alot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: skysmom

customer_reviews.title: There are probably better quality curtains but for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the thermal characteristics more than anything else. There are probably better quality curtains but for the price,I'm very happy.Noticeable temperature difference in rooms where I installed.
customer_reviews.author: TC

product_meta.title: Best Home Fashion Premium Blackout Curtain Panels - Solid Thermal Insulated Window Treatment Blackout Drapes for Bedroom - Back Tab & Rod Pocket (52" W x 63" L, Beige)
product_meta.description: Size:52" W x 63" L| Color:BeigeLet our Best Home Fashion Basic Thermal Insulated Blackout Curtains transform your home by adding both warmth and elegance. Our Blackout Curtains will reliably keep out the light for the day sleepers, graveyard shift workers, students, and more. Choose from our wide array of functional and fashionable designs, colors, and sizes to decorate your windows with. We offer two hanging options (back-tab and/or rod pocket) for versatile styling. Care instruction: Machine wash warm with like colors. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Warm iron as needed. *For proper fullness, panels should measure 2-3 times the width of your window. **The digital images we display have the most accurate color possible. However, due to differences in computer monitors, we cannot be responsible for variations in color between the actual product and your screen. ***Darker colors are more effective in blocking out light.
feature_bullets: Features an innovative triple weave fabric construction to block out sunlight and harmful UV rays. Insulates against the heat and cold, saving you money & energy. Laboratory-tested innovative fabric construction that insulates against the cold.
Energy efficient, insulation, noise reduction, improve sleep, high quality.
Header Size: 0.5 inches / Hem Size: 2 inches
Features both back tab and rod pocket hanging styles for versatile styling. 100% polyester. NO tie backs included.
Measurements: Panel (52" W x 63" L), Set (104" W x 63" L), Set includes two (2) machine washable curtain panels
